TextEncoderEncodeInto.summary:
The TextEncoder.encodeInto() method takes a
string to encode and a destination to put resulting UTF-8 encoded text into, and returns a dictionary object indicating the
progress of the encoding.
This is potentially more performant than the older encode() method â€” especially when the target buffer is a view into a Wasm heap.
TextEncoderEncodeInto.returns: An object, which contains two members:
